scripts.install: concurrently "cd ff-fes-xlsx && npm install" "cd ff-fes && npm install" "cd lme && npm install" "cd ff-formulajs && npm install" "cd demo-apps/angular-demo && npm install" "cd demo-apps/adminlte && npm install" "cd ff-ssh-git && npm install" "cd lme-api && npm install"
